Draws boxes on your screen that change color with the day and month cycle.
I\'m using Colored Boxes Live Wallpaper for Android. Learn more: http://www.upokecenter.com/projects/colorwallpaper
I\'m using Colored Boxes Live Wallpaper for Android
Boxes become darker at night and lighter at day
Detects your location to help find out if it\'s day or night
Draw colored boxes where you tap the home screen
Boxes change color as the month progresses
Color wheel hue of boxes drawn (currently %s deg.)
